department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Government of Canada, as part of the Greening Government Initiative’s (GGI) Greening Fleet Working Group is circulating the attached Calls for Information as it relates to Electric Vehicle Charging Management Systems in Parking Lots.  Any interested party that would like to contribute answers or provide information is asked to do so through the process identified in the Calls for Information documents.  Information and responses submitted will be compiled and shared with GGI members after the closing date.",
duration_in_months: Oh this is a little tricky
